## Tutorials

[Survival analysis in R](https://www.emilyzabor.com/tutorials/survival_analysis_in_r_tutorial.html):  a detailed tutorial on conducting survival analyses in R, including an introduction to the basics of survival analysis, landmark analyses and time-dependent covariates, competing risks, and a selection of advanced topics.

[Creating websites in R](https://www.emilyzabor.com/tutorials/rmarkdown_websites_tutorial.html): a basic introduction to creating simple websites in RMarkdown, using a website for my cats as an example.
